mapper.select: SELECT /* */ REG_DATE AS regDate /* */ , TELEMSG_NO AS telemsgNo /* */ , REQUST_DE AS requstDe /* */ , VIRTL_ACNUTNO AS virtlAcnutno /* */ , BIZRNO AS bizrno /* */ , STDR_DE AS stdrDe /* */ , NEW_DE AS newDe /* */ , GOODS_CODE AS goodsCode /* */ , ACNUT_BLCE AS acnutBlce /* */ , TRMNAT_BLCE AS trmnatBlce /* */ , BFRX_INTR AS bfrxIntr /* */ , AFTTX_INTR AS afttxIntr /* */ , CRRX AS crrx /* */ , INCMTAX AS incmtax /* */ , IHNTS AS ihnts /* */ , AGSPT AS agspt /* */ , FEE AS fee /* */ , DELNG_STDR_DE AS delngStdrDe /* */ , DELNG_SE_CN AS delngSeCn /* */ , GOODS_NM AS goodsNm /* */ , APPLC_TASK_NM AS applcTaskNm /* */ , INCOME_BEGIN_DE AS incomeBeginDe /* */ , INCOME_END_DE AS incomeEndDe /* */ , RSPNS_CODE AS rspnsCode /* */ , RSPNS_MSSAGE AS rspnsMssage /* */ , SEND_YN AS sendYn /* */ FROM T0500300 WHERE 1=1 AND REG_DATE = #{regDate} AND SEND_YN = #{sendYn}
